name: Don't Roll One
description:
Made for the GMTK game jam 2022.

You're controlling a stack of poker chips. Sacrifice them one by one while trying to shoot the enemy cards.

After each level, choose a good and a bad powerup. The dice will decide which powerups are applied to you in the next level.

Instructions

WASD - Move

Click - Shoot

M - Mute music

Enemy cards

1 - 1 HP

2 - 2 HP (faster than 1)

K - 3 HP (throws crowns)

A - 4 HP (faster when near player)

Q - 5 HP (throws missile crowns)

All code, art and music by me.

PROTIP: Don't roll ONE.
